POLICY.TITLE: Data Sharing Policy for hum0004
POLICY.POLICY_TEXT: In addition to the NBDC Policy, the use of this data is limited to the researchers who work on Lung Cancer Study.

POLICY.TITLE: Company User Limit
POLICY.POLICY_TEXT: In addition to the NBDC Policy, this data is not allowed to use for researchers who work for any private companies.

POLICY.TITLE: P-DIRECT policy
POLICY.POLICY_TEXT: In addition to the NBDC Policy, data users must include the following statement in the research proposal for IRB; we take and share the responsibilities for secure management and proper use of P-DIRECT data deposited in the NBDC Human Database with the head of the institution.

POLICY.TITLE: Data Sharing Policy for hum0039
POLICY.POLICY_TEXT: In addition to the NBDC Policy, the use of this data is limited to the researchers who work on analyzing TKI resistant mechanisms for gastrointstinal stromal tumor.

POLICY.TITLE: Familial samples
POLICY.POLICY_TEXT: In addition to the NBDC Policy, data users must not attempt to re-identify or examine genetic relationships within a family using sequencing data combined with clinical and familial information from datasets beyond the academic research purpose.

POLICY.TITLE: Data Sharing Policy for hum0084
POLICY.POLICY_TEXT: In addition to the NBDC Policy, the use of this data is limited to the researchers who work on bone marrow transplantation or factors for donors' safety. Moreover, this data is not allowed to use for researchers who work for any private companies.

POLICY.TITLE: Cancer Research Use Only
POLICY.POLICY_TEXT: In addition to the NBDC Policy, the use of this data is limited to the researchers who work on cancer studies.

POLICY.TITLE: Data Sharing Policy for hum0101
POLICY.POLICY_TEXT: In addition to the NBDC Policy, the use of this data is limited to the researchers who work on primary immunodeficiency studies. Data users must not attempt to re-identify or examine genetic relationships within a family using sequencing data combined with clinical and familial information from datasets beyond the original study purpose.

POLICY.TITLE: Data Sharing Policy for hum0046
POLICY.POLICY_TEXT: In addition to the NBDC Policy and the company limitation policy, researchers working for a company can access the data who is collaborating with a member of Division of Genome Medicine, the Institute for Genome Research, Tokushima University.
